attributes.action: State that he will not use catastrophic predictions of global warming to try to con us into accepting more nuclear power stations - a strategy seemingly used by the former PM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems obvious that the supporters of nuclear power are using dire predictions about global warming (which is probably not man made anyway) to try to get us to accept the building of more nuclear power plants in the UK. This is a huge SCAM. The real reason for wanting more nuclear power stations is nothing to do with CO2 emissions it is to do with not allowing this country to be an importer of energy from countries it does not wish to be tied to such as RUSSIA.
